noData.title: No Data Found
noData.description: Configure the webhook to start receiving real-time analytics data from your contact center.

tooltips.totalCalls: Total number of calls processed through the webhook system
tooltips.averageSentiment: Average sentiment score calculated from time-weighted sentiment analysis (0-100 scale, higher = more positive)
tooltips.sentimentRecoveryRate: Percentage of calls where negative sentiment was recovered to neutral/positive during the conversation
tooltips.resolutionRate: Percentage of calls that were marked as resolved based on conversation analysis
tooltips.averageCallDuration: Average duration of calls in seconds, calculated from the audio duration data in webhooks
